title: EU leaders confirm Christine Lagarde's appointment as head of ECB
text:
EU leaders confirm Christine Lagarde's appointment as head of ECB

Economy 2 minutes ago (Oct 18, 2019 06:34)

© Reuters. FILE PHOTO: IMF Managing Director Lagarde attends the Women's Forum Americas in Mexico City BRUSSELS (Reuters) - European Union leaders confirmed on Friday the appointment of Christine Lagarde as the new chief of the European Central Bank, replacing Mario Draghi from November 1. Lagarde's confirmation for a non-renewable term of eight years comes after EU leaders nominated her for the position on July 2.

EU leaders confirm Christine Lagarde's appointment as head of ECB
description: EU leaders confirm Christine Lagarde's appointment as head of ECB
